name: Dying Light: Unturned Weapon Pack
summary: This free DLC created for the Unturned crossover event in Dying Light contains a unique outfit and blueprints for three completely new, almost indestructible “low-poly” weapons modeled after Unturned items (Rake, Machete, and Hockey Stick).
